100162/t 600 2600.19: speak Marlon "...This abandoned mineshaft is emanating strong magical energies.#$b#It's been abandoned for decades. Quite nearly as long as the late Marlon oversaw it."
100162/t 600 2600.22: speak Marlon "There's certainly some valuable materials down there....#$b#But a dark place, undisturbed for so long... I'm afraid ore isn't the only thing you'll find..."
100162/t 600 2600.26: speak Marlon "Mmm... I believe you'll be needing this, evergreen one."
100162/t 600 2600.40: speak Marlon "By the way, I'm filling in for the adventure guild just nearby.#$b#Prove yourself and I might consider making you a member."
